sentences.en: An aromatic beef stew waited on the stove.
sentences.cn: 炉子上放着香味四溢的炖牛肉。

sentences.en: Aromatic capsules are great for easing the discomfort of a stuffy nose.
sentences.cn: 芳香胶囊对缓解鼻塞有奇效。

sentences.en: Aromatic herbs are often used in cooking.
Direct alkoxylation of aromatic compounds is virtually unknown.
sentences.cn: 事实上还不知道芳香族化合物的直接烷氧基化的方法.

sentences.en: Humic acids are usually regarded as polymers of aromatic compounds.
sentences.cn: 腐殖酸通常被看作是芳烃化合物的聚合物.

sentences.en: It has an agreeable aromatic smell.
Most direct substitution of groups bound to an aromatic nucleus is limited to diazonium salts.
sentences.cn: 大多数连于芳核能被直接取代的基团仅限于重氮盐.

sentences.en: Pyran is not aromatic, but the phrylium ion is.
sentences.cn: 吡喃不是芳香的, 但眬英嗡离子是.

sentences.en: The absorption peaks arising from unsaturated and aromatic vibrations are considered in Chapter 3 and 5.
sentences.cn: 由不饱和以及芳香化合物振动产生的吸收谱带将在第三和第五章中讨论.

sentences.en: The aromatic smoke of cooking fires floated lazily aloft.
sentences.cn: 炊烟带着诱人的香味袅袅上升,随风飘荡.

sentences.en: The benzenoid hydrocarbon are all nonclassical and, thus potentially aromatic.
sentences.cn: 苯环型烃都是非经典烃, 因此,可能是芳香烃.

sentences.en: The nitrators used in the manufacturing of aromatic nitrocompounds consist of iron vessels.
sentences.cn: 制造芳香族硝基化合物的硝化器为铁制的容器.

sentences.en: The sex electrons which occupy this trous - shaped cloud are called the aromatic sextet.
sentences.cn: 显示这个弯筒形云的六个电子叫芳香六偶体.

sentences.en: The six electrons which occupy this cloud are called the aromatic sextet.
sentences.cn: 这个云里的六个电子叫芳香六偶体.

sentences.en: They are sometimes difficult to differentiate from aromatic or olefinic absorptions.
sentences.cn: 有时它们就难于和芳香族或烯烃的吸收峰相互区别.

words.tran_cn: [助剂]芳香的，芬芳的；芳香族的

phrases.tran_cn: 芳香族化合物；芳族化合物

trans.tran_cn: 芳香的，有香味的，[化]芳香族的
